text: Selfie is a studio album by Italian singer Mina.http://velvetmusic.it/2014/06/28/mina-recensione-selfie-nuovo- album/http://www.lastampa.it/2014/06/10/blogs/on-the-road/selfie-di-mina- album-semestrali-per-un-fenomeno-senza- tempo-67XmrsAtP6PHh4MbWPZ2PP/pagina.html It was released originally on June 10, 2014 http://www.sorrisi.com/musica/mina-selfie-album/ and also released on vinyl on June 17, 2014. It is Mina's first album of new songs since Piccolino in 2011.http://www.soundsblog.it/post/16329/mina-piccolino-e-il-nuovo-album- copertina-e-tracklist ==Track listing== ==Weekly charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (2014) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:Mina (Italian singer) albums Category:2014 albums
title: Selfie (album)
